cast.name: 阿尔弗雷德·希区柯克 Alfred Hitchcock
奥斯卡·霍莫尔卡 Oskar Homolka

director.name: 保罗·阿尔蒙德 Paul Almond

this_title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents:The Ikon of Eliaha
introduction: Carpius owns antique shop in Cyprus and is quite excited to hear that a local monastery may be in possession of a very valuable icon. Knowing that a client would pay a fortune for it, he arranges to visit the monastery to steal the icon. During the robbery, Carpius kills a praying monk but claims it was an accident. The Abbot says he will forgive him but as he has sinned, he must pray for forgiveness. Only then does Carpius understand what the Abbot has in mind.
chinese_title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents:The Ikon of Eliaha
